title: Insert Quarto Helpers
text: R package containing RStudio Addin help insert (‘stamp’) useful little code blocks Quarto document. See : package website full list available functions Quarto website full documentation install package: restart RStudio ’ll see functions ‘QUARTOSTAMP’ Addins dropdown.

title: quartostamp: Insert Quarto Helpers — quartostamp-package
text: RStudio Addin help insert ('stamp') useful little code blocks Quarto document.

title: Insert Columns — stamp_columns
text: Insert horizontal two-column layout percentage widths

title: Insert Custom Footer — stamp_footer
text: Insert custom footer Revealjs presentation slide

title: Insert Speaker Notes — stamp_notes
text: Insert speaker notes Revealjs presentation slide

title: Insert Tabset — stamp_tabset
text: Insert panel tabset Revealjs presentation slide

title: quartostamp 0.0.0.9000
text: Set package license, news, readme. Added RStudio Addins infrastructure (inst/rstudio/addins.dcf). Added first stamp_() functions.
